basics.name: Jonathan Xu
basics.objective: To continually aim for excellence in life and work by pursuing and perfecting new skills and technologies

summary: SWE Intern on the Cloud Backup team
Worked on various front end, back end, and agent features for backing up MongoDB Atlas/Cloud Manager instances
Helped design and implement an alternative way to store MongoDB Oplogs by using Amazon S3
Developed an interactive web application used to analyze video footage
Used AngularJS and D3.js for data visualization and analysis
Interfaced with a REST API to save and retrieve data from a MySQL server
Managed data within Hadoop clusters using tools such as Hive and Sqoop
Created, populated, managed an ElasticSearch index and built data visualizations using the Kibana interface
Built user interfaces and data visualizations for marketing data using D3.js

projects.name: Grapevine
summary: Grapevine is a social event finding iOS and Android app where users can post hosted events or find ones happening near by
Worked on a RESTful API backend architecture to manage app data
Built using Node.js, Express, Chai, and Socket.IO with a MySQL database
Hosted on AWS using Elastic Beanstalk, S3 for image/video uploads, and RDS for MySQL hosting

projects.name: Enrich
summary: Enrich introduces beginners to investing by automatically upcharging purchases and putting the extra charge into a portfolio that reflects past transactions
Winner of Best Financial Hack presented by Capital One and best use of AWS
Built using Swift, Node.js and MongoDB, hosted on AWS Elastic Beanstalk

projects.name: Itineratr
summary: Itineratr is a web application that generates personalized travel itineraries for vacationers based on variables such as budget or party size
Winner of Small World prize presented by Amadeus
Built using AngularJS, Node.js, and Microsoft Azure
Created redcrobotics.com using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Website used as a promotional tool as well as a way to manage team applications, contact, and member information
